story:
Once upon a time, in a land filled with love and kindness, there was a young boy named Samuel. Samuel was a kind and curious child, always eager to learn about the world around him and help those in need.

One night, as Samuel lay in bed, he looked out his window and saw a group of stars twinkling in the sky. He wondered what it would be like to touch a star and reach for the heavens.

As he drifted off to sleep, Samuel had a dream. In his dream, he found himself floating up into the night sky, surrounded by the stars he had admired from his window. He felt a sense of peace and wonder as he soared higher and higher.

Suddenly, he heard a voice calling out to him. "Who are you, and what do you seek?" the voice asked.

Samuel looked around and saw an angel, bathed in a warm, golden light. "I am Samuel," he said. "I am just a curious boy who wants to learn about the world and help those in need."

The angel smiled down at him. "That is a noble goal," the angel said. "But there is one thing you must remember above all else. God loves you, and He is always with you, no matter where you go or what you do."

Samuel felt a warmth in his heart as the angel spoke. He knew that the angel was right, and he felt grateful for the love of God in his life.

From that night on, Samuel made sure to always remember the love of God, no matter where his curiosity and kindness took him. He grew up to be a kind and compassionate man, always ready to help those in need and share the love of God with others.

And every night, before he went to bed, Samuel would look up at the stars and remember the angel's words, feeling grateful for the love of God in his life.

The end.

Now, my dear son, as you drift off to sleep, remember the love of God in your heart and the kindness and curiosity that makes you who you are. Goodnight, sweet prince.
